document_data.name: ''Lifedrinker Short Sword''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lifedrinker short swords''''' were [[enchanted]] blades that sapped their victims vitality, found in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Lifedrinker'' [[short sword]]s possessed an unholy aura as they thrived on bloodshed, absorbing the pain and blood of their victims and revitalized the wielder when they suffered significant harm. The sapped life essence ''[[regenerated]]'' and healed the wielder while dealing necrotic damage in addition to the swords' ''+2'' enchantment.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, the ''lifedrinker short swords'' were in use by bandits and orcs of the [[Sword Mountains]], and the [[Old Owl Well]]. One such sword was wielded by pirate Lieutenant [[Gadain]] who worked for a [[Luskan]]ite buccaneer [[Kajin]].
